QuestData.Title: Dropping Our Signal
QuestData.Description: The beacon in Amberglow Hollow seems to have been tampered with. Right before the signal cut out the Klaxxi'va picked up a signal for another paragon nearby.$b$bThey believe he is hidden in that wretched little swamp, Duskroot Fen.$b$bI will meet you in the fen to set up a temporary beacon until I can get Amberglow operational again.$b$bYou will wake the paragon and then you will help me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Awaken the paragon in Duskroot Fen.
